dialogue.prompt:
You arrive at Jarred's house tired but resoundingly triumphant."A very exasperated Jarred enters a few minutes later.
"Incredible! You're too fast!"
"Anyone what can I do for you?

options.narrSays: You ask Jarred for flashlights. "Flashlights? In this part of town **we actually call them 'sthgilhsalf'**. Anyway I have a few spare, here you go!"
You decide to go back home

dialogue.prompt:
At last you arrive exasperated at Jarred's house. Jarred doesn't even seem to be sweating.
He welcomes you into his home anyway but you can feel his disappointment in you nonetheless.

options.narrSays: You decide to go back home
